I remember the days when Nokia( with Jorma Olilla at the helm) ruled the roost, European market share was above 50 percent and US market share was in the 35 percent range. Well, those days are long gone, and as you so sweetly put it, Stephen Elop , in your recent Q4 earnings release, "Nokia faces some significant challenges in our competitiveness and our execution.
